BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring city agencies to offer career counseling to municipal employees to advise them of professional development and promotional opportunities
Items.MatterName: Requiring city agencies to offer career counseling to municipal employees to advise them of professional development and promotional opportunities.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of citywide administrative services to administer workplace culture surveys
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of citywide administrative services to administer workplace culture surveys.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the commissioner of citywide administrative services to report on the administration of promotion examinations
Items.MatterName: Requiring the commissioner of citywide administrative services to report on the administration of promotion examinations.
